Key Match Events: Bhanuka Rajapaksa scored 31 runs off 14 balls
Danushka Gunathilaka chipped in with a 33-run knock
Kusal Mendis and Pathum Nissanka put on 62 runs for the opening wicket
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka desperately wanted to make a comeback after being bowled out for 105 against Afghanistan in a Group B clash a week ago
Post-Match Reflections: Rajapaksa said that it was very embarrassing for Sri Lanka to get out for 105, so they wanted to put their hands up and show the nation they weren't as bad as that
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by four wickets in the Super Four match of Asia Cup 2022
Rajapaksa has had a “floating role” for various teams in T20 cricket over the last few months
Others: The wicket seemed quite good with the way Afghanistan batted, Sri Lanka just needed to be a bit cautious when the spinners came into play
